### Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Title: Tank Assy, Saddle Fuel

#### Reference Number
* Ref: PW-_CAG-010-28840
* Solicitation Number: T8493-220040/A

#### Publication and Closing Dates
* Publication Date: 2022-10-18
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-01 at 14:00:00

#### Description and Background
Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), exclusively for government-approved suppliers and contracted companies. This procurement aims to acquire the following for the Challenger aircraft from Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD): Tank Assy, Saddle Fuel (PN: 604-62145-2).

#### Tendering Process
A competitive bidding process is employed, with select suppliers invited to participate. Suppliers are required to meet qualification requirements to be eligible.

#### Opportunity to become a Qualified Supplier
A Notice will be posted yearly on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.

#### Contracting Authority Contact
For inquiries and to become a qualified supplier, please contact Oliver Morones:
Oliver Morones, Supply Specialist
Direction Générales des approvisionnements
Secteur de l’approvisionnement et du soutien en équipment aérospatial et terrestre (SASEAT)
Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada / Gouvernement du Canada
11, rue Laurier, Portage III, 7C2, Gatineau (QC) K1A 0S5
Tél. :  873-455-5233  
Oliver.Morones@pwgsc.gc.ca
